Package Spooding.Spooder

Class SentimentData

java.lang.Object
Spooding.Spooder.MongoConnect
Spooding.Spooder.SentimentData
public class SentimentData
extends MongoConnect
SentimentData class for storing various sentiment data to be used in Sentimental Analysis Imports data from MongoDB
